node.title: Alker's 2021 reignites career and has fifty-year-old dreaming of Major glory
node.description: The Kiwi had a stellar year and wants more success in 2022.
node.content: ["Kiwi golfer Steven Alker was once ranked as high as No. 120 in the world, but dropped significantly, before a remarkable end to 2021 helped reignite his career.", "And now at the right-old-age of 50, Alker is targeting Major glory - with one event in particular in his sights.", "Watch the video above for more"]
